description: Details of Travel Plan pursuant to condition 6 of planning ref: 184337VAR dated 16.04.2018 for Application for Minor Material Amendments (S.73) to vary planning conditions 2, 11 and 12 of planning permission reference 161452FUL dated 01.08.2017 for 'Construction of a three-storey high apartment building containing 3 no. 3-bedroom flats and 23 no. houses ranging between three and four-storeys high (16 no. 3-bedroom and 7 no. 4-bedroom) with access taken from a new vehicle and pedestrian street from McNair Road and alterations to Glade Lane to enable vehicle access to the development; car parking spaces; a swing bridge for pedestrians and cyclists over Maypole Dock and associated footpaths / cycle paths between Maypole Dock and Glade Lane; hard and soft landscaping and ecological enhancements throughout the site - (Departure from the Local Plan).' Application seeking to allow the follow amendments - substitute plans (condition 2); Change in the roof profiles of the buildings; Reduction in the height of seven units by one-storey from 4 to 3 storeys; Alteration to the unit mix (removal of 7 No. 4 bed units to become 3 bed units and therefore all units to be 3 beds); Alterations to green roof system to reduce quantum from 492 sq.m to provide 334 sq. m. of sedum roof; PV panels re-oriented in conjunction with amendment to roof design; and lowering site levels by 350mm'
